dcterms:creator: S. Shao
Z. Zhao
B. Li
T. Xiao
G. Yu
X. Zhang
J. Sun
dcterms:description: CrowdHuman is one of the most persuasive occluded pedestrian datasets. There are 22.64 objects per image, of which 2.40 objects are heavily overlapping (the IoU with other objects greater than 0.5). The proportion of heavily overlapping objects in each image is about 10.6%.
dcterms:title: CrowdHuman

dcterms:creator: S. Zhang
R. Benenson
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: CityPersons is a common pedestrian detection benchmark that contains 5000 images in total, separated as 2975 images for training, 500 images for validation, and 1525 images for testing. On average, there are 0.32 heavily overlapping objects per image.
dcterms:title: CityPersons
